code: import React from'react';import{useLanguage}from'../contexts/LanguageContext';import{translations}from'../translations/translations';import ScrollReveal from'./ScrollReveal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Services=()=>{const{language}=useLanguage();const t=translations[language];const services=[{icon:"üåê",title:t.webDev.title,description:t.webDev.description},{icon:"üì±",title:t.mobileDev.title,description:t.mobileDev.description},{icon:"üé®",title:t.design.title,description:t.design.description},{icon:"üõí",title:t.ecommerce.title,description:t.ecommerce.description},{icon:"üîç",title:t.seo.title,description:t.seo.description},{icon:"üí°",title:t.consulting.title,description:t.consulting.description}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"services",className:"services",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollReveal,{className:"reveal",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:t.servicesTitle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-grid",children:services.map((service,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollReveal,{className:"reveal-scale",delay:index*100,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"service-icon",children:service.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:service.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:service.description})]})},index))})]})});};export default Services;
